flawed_nl_solution:
60% of female alligators are adults because 100 - 40 = <<100-40=60>>60
There are 25 female alligators because 15 / 0.6 = <<15/0.6=52>>52
There are 50 alligators in total because 52 / 0.5 = <<52/0.5=104>>104
There are 25 male alligators because 104 / 2 = <<104/2=52>>52
#### 52

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 25, not 52. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
